title: Search Application
description: Developed a search application utilizing the WikipediaAPI, enabling real-time querying of over 6 million articles in the vast Wikipedia database. Implemented real-time search, asynchronous data handling, and robust error handling, enhancing user experience with rapid response times under 2 seconds.

title: Mental Health Chatbot
description: Built an interactive chatbot capable of understanding and responding to user input in real-time with contextually relevant responses. Utilized natural language processing techniques to analyze user messages, achieving an accuracy of 92.57% and reducing loss to 0.42 over 600+ epochs.

title: Multi-Language Compiler
description: Engineered a compiler capable of recognizing and parsing 5 languages, including C++, Java, Python, C#, and Haskell. Streamlined the token recognition and classification process, achieving an accuracy of over 95%. Built an interface to simplify input handling and visually display token classifications.

title: BookList App
description: Created a feature-rich booklist application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to manage and display a list of books. Implemented functionality for adding, editing, and deleting book entries with persistent data storage using local storage. Ensured a user-friendly and responsive design with intuitive navigation and form validation.
